Take Home Ex3: VAST Challenge 2024 Mini-Challenge 3 [WIP]

Author

Kristine Joy Paas

Published

May 22, 2024

Modified

June 1, 2024

Setup

Loading Packages

pacman::p_load(jsonlite, tidyverse, ggraph, tidygraph, visNetwork, patchwork, ggtext, knitr)

Loading Data

mc3_data <- fromJSON("data/mc3.json")

Data Wrangling

Extracting Nodes

mc3_nodes <- as_tibble(mc3_data$nodes) %>%
  mutate(
    id = as.character(id),
    subtype = strsplit(type, ".", fixed=TRUE) %>% sapply(tail, n=1),
    type = strsplit(type, ".", fixed=TRUE) %>% sapply('[', 2)
  ) %>%
  select(id, type, subtype)

mc3_nodes %>% head(n = 10) %>% kable()
id type subtype
Abbott, Mcbride and Edwards Organization Company
Abbott-Gomez Organization Company
Abbott-Harrison Organization Company
Abbott-Ibarra Organization Company
Abbott-Sullivan Organization Company
Acevedo and Sons Organization Company
Acevedo PLC Organization Company
Acevedo, Lloyd and Young Organization Company
Acevedo, Miller and Edwards Organization Company
Acevedo, Thompson and Myers Organization Company

Extracting Edges

mc3_edges <- as_tibble(mc3_data$links) %>%
  mutate(
    source = as.character(source),
    target = as.character(target),
    subtype = strsplit(type, ".", fixed = TRUE) %>% sapply(tail, n = 1),
    type = ifelse(
      grepl("Event.Owns", type),
      "Ownership",
      ifelse(grepl("Relationship", type), "Relationship", "Employment")
    )
  ) %>%
  select(source, target, type, subtype) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  filter(source != target)

mc3_edges %>% head(n = 10) %>% kable()
source target type subtype
Avery Inc Allen, Nichols and Thompson Ownership Shareholdership
Berger-Hayes Jensen, Morris and Downs Ownership Shareholdership
Bowers Group Barnett Inc Ownership Shareholdership
Bowman-Howe Bennett Ltd Ownership Shareholdership
Boyd and Sons Armstrong, Bennett and Deleon Ownership Shareholdership
Brown-Johnson Alexander-Wagner Ownership Shareholdership
Burke, Hernandez and Alexander Becker-Mckinney Ownership Shareholdership
Cain, Rodriguez and Gonzales Beck-Green Ownership Shareholdership
Choi, Ortiz and Goodwin Barton, King and Hall Ownership Shareholdership
Cochran Ltd Crosby Ltd Ownership Shareholdership

Questions

Q4: Relations with SouthSeafood Express Corp

Direct Relations

Edges

ssfec_edges <- mc3_edges %>%
  filter(source == "SouthSeafood Express Corp" |
           target == "SouthSeafood Express Corp")
ssfec_edges %>% kable()
source target type subtype
AguaLeska Transit N.V. SouthSeafood Express Corp Ownership Shareholdership
Tainamarine Fishing Co SouthSeafood Express Corp Ownership Shareholdership

Nodes

ssfec_nodes <- mc3_nodes %>%
  filter(id %in% ssfec_edges$source |
           id %in% ssfec_edges$target) %>%
  mutate(
    focus = (id == "SouthSeafood Express Corp")
  )
ssfec_nodes %>% kable()
id type subtype focus
AguaLeska Transit N.V. Organization FishingCompany FALSE
SouthSeafood Express Corp Organization FishingCompany TRUE
Tainamarine Fishing Co Organization FishingCompany FALSE

Graph

ssfec_graph <- tbl_graph(nodes = ssfec_nodes, edges = ssfec_edges, directed = TRUE)
ggraph(ssfec_graph, layout = "linear", circular = TRUE) +
  
  # Render nodes
  geom_node_point(aes(color = focus), show.legend = FALSE, size = 30) +
  geom_node_text(
    aes(label = str_wrap(id, width = -1)),
    family = font_family,
    size = 3,
    color = "white"
  ) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("blue", "gold3")) +
  
  # Render edges
  geom_edge_link(
    aes(label = subtype),
    # Control arrow
    arrow = arrow(type = "closed", length = unit(0.025, "npc")),
    end_cap = circle(12, "mm"),
    start_cap = circle(12, "mm"),
    # Format labels
    angle_calc = "along",
    label_dodge = unit(0.04, "npc"),
    family = font_family,
    show.legend = FALSE
  ) +
  
  # Hack to reduce distance between nodes
  # This is to not clip the nodes in the edge of the plot
  # ref: https://stackoverflow.com/a/66991383
  ylim(-1.3, 0.8) +
  xlim(-1, 1) +
  
  # Style graph
  unset_graph_style() +
  theme_graph(base_family = font_family, plot_margin = margin(0)) +
  plot_annotation(title = "SouthSeafood Express Corp's Direct Network", subtitle = "Two other fishing companies, <span style='color:blue;'>**AguaLeska Transit N.V.**</span> and <span style='color:blue;'>**Tainamarine Fishing Co**</span> hold shares in<br />SouthSeafood Express Corp.") &
  theme(
    text = element_text(family = font_family),
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = rel(1.4)),
    plot.subtitle = element_markdown(color = "grey50")
  )
